templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@pageneralstore.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.pageneralstore.com/return_policy

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/pageneralstore/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/PAGeneralstore

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us near you here: https://www.pageneralstore.com/retail-locations

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 800-545-4891 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: All orders will ship within 1-3 business days unless you schedule a later date. If you need delivery on a specific date, we recommend using 2 Day or UPS Next Day Air Shipping methods.

templates.name: Shelf Life of Seltzerâ€™s Lebanon Bologna
templates.content: You can store your Seltzer's Lebanon Bologna in the fridge but it must be consumed within 14 days, however, it may last several days past that if stored properly.

templates.name: Do you have a catalog?
templates.content: Yes! You can request one here: https://www.pageneralstore.com/catalog_request You can also download the PDF version of our catalog at the following link: https://www.pageneralstore.com/catalogdownload

templates.name: Can I write a gift message?
templates.content: Yes, you'll be able to write the gift message during the checkout process. It's right after you enter the shipping info under "Other information".

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@pageneralstore.com, live chat with one of our agents via the website or give us a call at 800-545-4891. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@pageneralstore.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: How do you keep the Soft Pretzels fresh?
templates.content: Soft Pretzels must be eaten or frozen within 2 days after the package leaves our dock. We always require a 2 Day shipping service, if UPS Ground won't deliver on time, to ensure you get them in time!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.pageneralstore.com/category/clearance
